title: Python's Name Origin
shortDescription: Python is named after Monty Python's Flying Circus, not the snake!
detailedDescription: Guido van Rossum, Python's creator, was reading scripts from the BBC comedy series 'Monty Python's Flying Circus' when he began implementing Python. He wanted a short, unique, and slightly mysterious name, so he decided to call the language Python.
examples: import antigravity  # Opens a web comic
from __future__ import braces  # Gives a humorous error
